divs: Sighting Detailslarge object that I see almost every night. It's very big and bright and sometimes can be seen in other areas of the sky. It appears and disappears out of nowhere. It hovers in one spot as planes fly by. It's brightness is what made me notice it. It has been there for months now around the same time every night.
trends: There have been 73 other sightings in Salt Lake City
There were 3 other sightings in Salt Lake City on or around November 5th 2013
